subject: Simsonn plus X Undetectable problem
description_text:
I buy the  simsonn plus X 3 pedal  and i had already install control box ground wire
but system always show "Disconnected" even I power off  & reconecty usb .
Can you help the problem ,thank you

[cid:23ac0f76-9653-46d7-8e68-c2baac5734bd][cid:f94185d9-c060-4a2b-bb84-32369fa69ac8]

conversations.body_text: Hi Chang hung-ming,    You can download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 using the link below. Then, follow the steps below to enter the firmware update process:    Press and hold the upgrade button on the PlusX controller box, then reconnect the USB. The software will enter SIMSONN Flasher Mode;    Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu to start the firmware update;    After the firmware update is completed, release the upgrade button;    Finally, test the pedal and perform a calibration.    https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
